titles.title: AMTRAK Act
To amend the exemption of certain legal requirements applied to Amtrak in making improvements to exclude the construction of advertisements.
Allowing More Transparency in Reviewing Advertising Construction Act
AMTRAK Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary:
Allowing More Transparency in Reviewing Advertising Construction Act or the AMTRAK Act
This bill eliminates the exemption of certain state and local requirements applied to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation (Amtrak) in making improvements to exclude the construction or display of advertisements.
